hypothesis_content.title: High Volatility Regime Exhaustion Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a STRESS regime day (BTC 1-day realized volatility > 8%), if the next day's price action remains within +/- 1.5% of the prior close and volume declines by >20%, taking a long gamma/long volatility position will be profitable over the next 3 days as volatility resets higher.
hypothesis_content.rationale: A sharp volatility spike followed by immediate price and volume contraction suggests panic exhaustion, not a sustained breakdown. Volatility tends to remain elevated and often makes another leg up as the market digests the move, benefiting long volatility positions.
entry_conditions: Current day volume < 0.8 * prior day volume
BTC price is within 10% of its 20-day high (no major breakdown)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 3 days after entry OR RV1D > 6% on any subsequent day

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volatility continues to decay monotonically after entry, and 3-day forward RV1D averages < 4%.
